input.sentences: we are having a basic training task today .
we will be going into the community to show how we respond .
with this task | we will be helping to prepare a building from storm damage .
here we are securing the windows .
it is good to be prepared .
output.sentences: The new graduates from basic training smiled for a posed photo.
Their commanding officer points and explains how his troops will help out.
Hard hats are required because the structure may not be safe.
They use long planks of wood to shore up the building.
The plastic sheeting will hopefully protect open areas.
